definitions.definition: A tankship , a vessel used to transport large quantities of liquid .
A motor truck with a tank to hold bulk liquid (with or without internal baffles).
A fuel tanker, petrol tanker, road tanker.
An aircraft carrying a large supply of jet fuel or avgas for aerial refueling of other aircraft, plus equipment allowing the in-air transfer of fuel.
examples: Without the KC-46 tankers orbiting in friendly airspace, our fighters would've run out of fuel long before reaching the combat zone.

definitions.definition: An aircraft built or modified to carry water and/or fire retardant for dropping on wildfires .
examples: While our ground teams cut firebreaks in the brush, the tankers kept the fire in the mountains at bay with frequent drops of water and retardant.

definitions.definition: Member of a tank crew, or of an armoured unit.

examples: I swung the tanker around just in time to take off with the lip.

main_definition: ( nautical ) A tankship , a vessel used to transport large quantities of liquid .
secondary_definitions: ( automotive , US ) A motor truck with a tank to hold bulk liquid (with or without internal baffles).
( automotive , UK ) A fuel tanker, petrol tanker, road tanker.
( aviation , usually military ) An aircraft carrying a large supply of jet fuel or avgas for aerial refueling of other aircraft, plus equipment allowing the in-air transfer of fuel.
( aviation , firefighting ) An aircraft built or modified to carry water and/or fire retardant for dropping on wildfires .
( military ) Member of a tank crew, or of an armoured unit.
